inputs.name: pathToVersionJson
inputs.label: Path to version.json
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to the version.json, which should contain the following properties: **'version': string** (e.g. '1.3.0'), **releaseBranches: string[]'' (the branch names that will be used for release versions).

inputs.name: updateNuspecFiles
inputs.label: Update Nuspec files
inputs.helpMarkDown: If set to _true_, the version will also be inserted/updated in `.nuspec` files

inputs.name: updateBuildNumber
inputs.label: Set build number
inputs.helpMarkDown: If set to _true_, the build number is set to the computed version
